page.content: children's play area. There is also a youthclub a Church hall and Broughton institute. Communications have been greatly improved by the building of the new bye pass to Hawarden. Car parking was a problem but tihs has been improved by the building of a car park. The local council is now considering a car park for the residents of Broughton.There is also a good bus service.Close to Broughton is Hawarden Airport which is the only civil airport in Clwyd.It is mainly used for executive travel by over 20 national companies and for some private flights.
